structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: In-state tuition for nonresident children and siblings of graduates.
law.text: Each institution of the postsecondary education system, as defined in KRS 164.001(17), that provides in-state tuition for nonresident children of graduates may provide the same in-state tuition for nonresident siblings of graduates.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2008). A reference to "KRS 164.001(16)" in 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 2, has been changed in codification to "KRS 164.001(17)" by the Reviser of Statutes under the authority of KRS 7.136(1) to reflect the addition of a new subsection and renumbering of succeeding subsections in KRS 164.001 in 2008 Ky. Acts ch.113, sec. 8.
